body:
This honestly would've ranked as my #1 all time favorite hentai ever in existence......

If they swapped Jedah with Morrigan. 

Seriously, perfect artstyle, perfect scenario, perfect sex act, all 3 characters are present, but they fudged it up by putting two in the wrong places.
Ive read it 2 hrs ago but didn't fav or comment at all seems like none other did so too
